amendment.description: To add an amount for a bed-down initiative to enable the C-130 aircraft of the Idaho Air National Guard to be the permanent carrier of the SENIOR SCOUT mission shelters of the 169th Intelligence Squadron of the Utah Air National Guard.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3484 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3484 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S7218-7221, S7270-7273; text: CR S7273) To add an amount for a bed-down initiative to enable the C-130 aircraft of the Idaho Air National Guard to be the permanent carrier of the SENIOR SCOUT mission shelters of the 169th Intelligence Squadron of the Utah Air National Guard.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3484 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3484 proposed by Senator Warner.
